variant.p: The entity also concludes that because the consideration that is in the form of a sales-based royalty relates specifically to the franchise licence (see paragraph B63A), the entity applies paragraph B63 of IFRS 15. After the transfer of the franchise licence, the entity recognises revenue as and when the customer’s sales occur because the entity concludes that this reasonably depicts the entity’s progress towards complete satisfaction of the franchise licence performance obligation.
